hero.name: SOHAIB LAARICHI
hero.description: 5th-year Computer Engineering student at EMSI, specializing in network architecture, security, and systems administration. Advanced skills in Java, Spring Boot, Next.js, and Cisco technologies. Seeking a professional opportunity to apply and develop my expertise in designing and deploying network and software solutions.

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: 5th-year Computer Engineering student at EMSI, specializing in network infrastructure and cybersecurity. My goal is to contribute to innovative technological solutions while deepening my expertise in network security and systems administration.

education.title: Education & Training
education.school: EMSI - École Marocaine des Sciences de l'Ingénieur

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with

jobs.title: Network Administrator Intern
jobs.description: Configured and maintained network infrastructure, implemented security protocols, and provided technical support for enterprise systems.
achievements: Configured enterprise-level network infrastructure serving 200+ users
Implemented security protocols reducing network vulnerabilities by 40%
Provided technical support with 95% first-call resolution rate
Automated network monitoring processes saving 10 hours weekly
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on system upgrades

jobs.title: IT Support Specialist
jobs.description: Provided comprehensive technical support, troubleshooted hardware and software issues, and assisted in system deployments.
achievements: Provided technical support to 150+ users across multiple departments
Troubleshooted hardware and software issues with 90% success rate
Assisted in system deployments and migrations
Reduced average ticket resolution time by 30%
Created technical documentation for common issues

jobs.title: Junior Developer
jobs.description: Developed web applications using modern frameworks, collaborated with design teams, and maintained code repositories.
achievements: Developed 5+ responsive web applications using React and Next.js
Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Maintained code repositories with Git best practices
Improved application performance by 25% through optimization
Delivered projects on time with 100% client satisfaction

jobs.title: Network Technician
jobs.description: Installed and maintained network equipment, performed troubleshooting, and supported network operations.
achievements: Installed network equipment for 50+ client locations
Performed network troubleshooting with 95% resolution rate
Supported daily network operations and maintenance
Reduced equipment downtime by 20% through proactive monitoring
Trained in fiber optic installation and testing

geobus.title: GeoBus - Bus Tracking System
geobus.description: A comprehensive bus tracking system for Marrakech, Morocco, consisting of a Spring Boot backend and Android mobile app. The system provides real-time bus tracking, nearest bus stop finder, and arrival time estimation to improve public transportation experience.
features: Real-time bus tracking on interactive maps
Nearest bus stop discovery based on user location
Walking time and bus arrival estimation
RESTful API with Spring Boot backend
MySQL database for bus stop and route data

mkhedmin.title: Mkhedmin.ma - Moroccan Freelance Platform
mkhedmin.description: A freelance platform specifically designed for the Moroccan market, offering localized features like Moroccan city filters, RTL support for Arabic, and WhatsApp integration. The platform connects freelancers and clients with advanced communication tools.

pharmalive.title: PharmaLive - Pharmacy Management
pharmalive.description: Comprehensive pharmacy management system developed in Java EE with Bootstrap interface. Manages inventory, prescriptions, sales and provides detailed analytics to optimize pharmaceutical operations.

callcenter.title: Call Center Desktop Application
callcenter.description: Call center application developed with JavaFX for modern UI components. Connected to MySQL database for customer management, call logging, and performance analytics.
features: Clean separation of concerns with business logic layer

reservation.title: Reservation Management System Swing
reservation.description: Reservation management system developed in Java Swing with object-oriented programming. Integrates calendar, automated confirmations and complete reservation management.
features: Clean OOP architecture with separation of responsibilities

network.title: Network Infrastructure Project
network.description: Complete network infrastructure design and implementation using Cisco equipment. VLAN configuration, routing protocols and network performance optimization.

cisco.title: Cisco ISE NAC Implementation
cisco.description: Complete Cisco Identity Services Engine network access control deployment. Identity management, policy enforcement and compliance monitoring.
